ActCustoms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Refund of Duties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the REFUND OF DUTIES REGULATIONS in order to meet Canadaâ€™s commitments under the amended Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA). An amendment to the Regulations is necessary to change the period of time for submitting a claim for a refund of duties paid on CCFTA-eligible goods from one to four years.
